original_text: And he burned his sons as an offering in the Valley of the Son of Hinnom, and used fortune-telling and omens and sorcery, and dealt with mediums and with necromancers. He did much evil in the sight of the Lord, provoking him to anger.
korean_text: 또 힌놈의 아들 골짜기에서 그의 아들들을 불 가운데로 지나가게 하며 또 점치며 사술과 요술을 행하며 신접한 자와 박수를 신임하여 여호와 보시기에 악을 많이 행하여 여호와를 진노하게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: And he burned his sons as an offering
in the Valley of the Son of Hinnom
and used fortune-telling and omens and sorcery
and dealt with mediums and with necromancers.
He did much evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 많이 행하였으니
